lines:
Turan

mp. Med. College 
'Tintin, Elina

August 31,191. 
my dear m. Stearus,

As I have been home almost a monts, Ideen 
if my duty to write and inform you of my condition in 
regards to my cum to do Leates! My Father has decided 
I to keep me in China this year and to prepare to enter 
I the China Hua College in Peking where glean perse

a further course of Chinese studies which I have been 
rather deficient. I shall of course lose no time on my 
ter Engels subjects, and I hope that this will luable 
me to return to the states next summer when I hope 
to have the pleasure of seeing you and humo, Steams 
again as to the amount I llave overdrawn from you 
please let my Father Know, and he will be very good 
to fund you the same. Pemit me to zamers 
you again ing gratitude for u kindness whicel you 
have bestared me, and I shall look back with 
mingle feelings upon the dayod have apent under 
your care, and leisele of alquantandes I have made 
La Andover whom I url here to be for patter, and 
wh tu tulion I hope to be always remembered. Please 
do not reserve ou non 29 in Days Hall for me. I 
concluding I hope that happiness and health shall 
abide with you always d'am

Yours obédiente,

S.S.Kuat
raw: Turan mp. Med. College 'Tintin, Elina August 31,191. my dear m. Stearus, As I have been home almost a monts, Ideen if my duty to write and inform you of my condition in regards to my cum to do Leates! My Father has decided I to keep me in China this year and to prepare to enter I the China Hua College in Peking where glean perse a further course of Chinese studies which I have been rather deficient. I shall of course lose no time on my ter Engels subjects, and I hope that this will luable me to return to the states next summer when I hope to have the pleasure of seeing you and humo, Steams again as to the amount I llave overdrawn from you please let my Father Know, and he will be very good to fund you the same. Pemit me to zamers you again ing gratitude for u kindness whicel you have bestared me, and I shall look back with mingle feelings upon the dayod have apent under your care, and leisele of alquantandes I have made La Andover whom I url here to be for patter, and wh tu tulion I hope to be always remembered. Please do not reserve ou non 29 in Days Hall for me. I concluding I hope that happiness and health shall abide with you always d'am Yours obédiente, S.S.Kuat

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter with an update about the year ahead. He will be staying in China to enter the Ching Hua College in Peking. He will pursue a course in Chinese studies, in which he is deficient. He hopes to return to the U.S. in the summer. He states that his father will settle the balance on his account. He expresses his deep thanks and asks that room 29 in Day's Hall not be held for him.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
